thread.title: Very pleasant stay
thread.title_full: Very pleasant stay - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LEO O
title: Very pleasant stay
text:
Stayed here for five nights. Had very much enjoyed a previous stay here 4 years ago, on that occasion daily housekeeping was included, not so this time, it was an extra cost of Â£15 per day, which was a little disappointing.
Had a lovely studio room overlooking the street. Room was a good size with a good kitchenette and a good sized fridge.
Bathroom has plenty of room to put own things, but could do with a grab rail for safety as shower is over a somewhat deep and narrow bath.
A couple of coat hooks near the door for cold weather coats would be helpful. Could also use a light to illuminate the clothes cupboard as it is very dark inside even in daylight.
Overall a very pleasant stay. Will definitely stay here again.
